attributes.action: Increase the 1% payrise for NHS workers
attributes.additional_details: A 1% pay increase is an insult after all they have done
attributes.background: Increase the NHS workers pay to reflect the gratitude we all gave for the tremendous work they have done throughout the pandemic

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
